about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of the Guardians of the South at the hands of Galvarino in his first adventure Galvarino Regresa to explore historical places of the Mapuche culture such as the Nahuelbuta mountain range, the Bio-Bio river, Copahue volcano or the Arauco fort in this third-person game where you will have to fight against a horde of conquerors and different final bosses for each level such as Don Claudio de la Roca, Michimalonco and others.

Throughout the different levels of Galvarino Regresa you will be able to interact with other characters that will help you in your adventure such as the magical Sayen or the wise Colo Colo .

A game based on a successful Chilean comic

Enjoy Galvarino's story while recognizing elements of Mapuche culture, whose characters and story are based on the successful Chilean comic series Guardianes del Sur created by Guido 'Kid' Salinas and Sebastian Castro. This first edition has the leading participation of Galvarino, later the versions of Caupolicán, Lautaro and of course Janequeo[/].

A visual style adapted from the comic

Galvarino Regresa has a design style that takes us to classic platform games but with the current power of 3D engines, you will be able to recognize elements of the Chilean Araucanía that will help you in your missions guided by magic Sayen who in his connection with nature will allow you to increase your level of Newen (Strength and energy).

What elements will you find

Pinion
The fruit of Pewén or Araucaria will allow you to recover your Newen (Energy) lost during battles.

Chemamull
Wooden statues of the Mapuche culture, are magical points where you can recover your adventure if you are defeated by a conqueror.

Lafreche
Little forest elves, Sayen needs you to help recover them during game missions

Your weapons

You are Galvarino, your only weapons are your claws that have replaced the hands that the conquerors have severed! your speed, agility and battle prowess will make your way in the adventures that await you.


Join the Galvatropa and fight with the weichafe!

Immerse yourself in the world of the Guardians of the South at the hands of Galvarino in his first adventure Galvarino Regresa to explore historical places of the Mapuche culture such as the Nahuelbuta mountain range, the Bio-Bio river, Copahue volcano or the Arauco fort in this third-person game where you will have to fight against a horde of conquerors and different final bosses for each level such as Don Claudio de la Roca, Michimalonco and others.

A game based on a successful Chilean comic

Enjoy Galvarino's story while recognizing elements of Mapuche culture, whose characters and story are based on the successful Chilean comic series Guardianes del Sur created by Guido 'Kid' Salinas and Sebastian Castro. This first edition has the leading participation of Galvarino, later the versions of Caupolicán, Lautaro and of course Janequeo[/].

Galvarino Regresa has a design style that takes us to classic platform games but with the current power of 3D engines, you will be able to recognize elements of the Chilean Araucanía that will help you in your missions guided by magic Sayen who in his connection with nature will allow you to increase your level of Newen (Strength and energy).

name: Galvarino Regresa

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Join Galvarino on his first adventure with the Guardians of the South
supported_languages:
Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
